item.title: Hive MySQL Metastore and HiveServer2 Setup
item.description: By default, Hive comes with an embedded derby metastore; which stores the meta data and schema of Hive. However, it allows only one user in embedded mode. So it’s advisable to setup an external metastore. Below will be the architecture with MySQL as Metastore.
